entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as having a new company car and answering a telephone call. He is also referred to as 'Vernon Dursley speaking'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as sneaking downstairs, picking the lock on the cupboard under the stairs, grabbing some of his books, and hiding them in his bedroom. He is also referred to as studying magic by night.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as one of Harry's best friends at Hogwarts and coming from a whole family of wizards.

relationships.description: Harry is keen to avoid trouble with his aunt and uncle, Uncle Vernon in particular.
Ron Weasley is one of Harry's best friends at Hogwarts.
